title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Communications (Retention of Data)
heading: 3. The 26th day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 26th day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Communications (Retention of Data) (Amendment) 
Act 2022 (No. 25 of 2022) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

section 1; 

section 2, other than insofar as that section inserts, in section 
1(1) of the Act of 2011, paragraph (d) of the definition of 
“superior officer”; 

sections 3 and 4; 

section 5, other than insofar as that section inserts, in section 6 
of the Act of 2011 amended by that section, subsections (3) and 
(4); 

(e) 

section 6, insofar as that section inserts the following in the Act 
of 2011: 

(i) 

sections 6A and 6B; 

(ii) 

section 6C, other than subsection (4); 

(iii) section 6D, other than subsections (4) and (10)(d); 

(iv) section 6E; 

(v) 

subsection (1), insofar as it relates to a member of the 
Garda Síochána, a member of the Permanent Defence 
Forces and an officer of the Revenue Commissioners, and 
subsections (2) to (5), of section 6F; 

(f) 

section 7, insofar as that section inserts the following in the Act 
of 2011: 

(i) 

section 7A, other than subsection (7); 

(ii) 

section 7B, other than subsections (7) and (14)(d); 

(iii) section 7C, other than subsection (7); 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th June, 2023.

sections 12A to 12F;

subsection (1),

the Revenue Commissioners,

(iii) section 12H;

HELEN MCENTEE,
